section.name: Requirements
section.p: Any JRE 1.4 VM should work. Get the latest for your platform straight from Sun. If you are running Mac OS/X Jaguar or Panther you should already be set. Please let us know of any problems.

section.name: NeuClear Executable
section.p: Download the NeuClear ID Executable. Excuse the long and ugly name, we will package it nicer later on. Currently this tool allows you to create a certificate and sign it. The jar file also contains all the required libraries and should be suitable for unpacking and adding to your favorite IDE's classpath.

This will list the options available. For more indepth information on the tool see the Busy Developers Guide

section.name: Sample Web Application
section.p: We provide a sample web application showing how to integrate NeuClear into an existing web application. Download the NeuClear ID War here.
This should be suitable for deployment on any servlet engine or J2EE appserver that supports version 2.3 of the Servlet API.
In tomcat you can simply drop it into the $CATALINA_HOME/webapps folder.
